attributes.additional_details:
To my dismay, there is not a single Wheelchair basketball (amongst others) club or team in the whole of the Three Rivers district. I have to travel an hour to the nearest club, which is just not good enough. I would like to help make enough noise for somebody to listen and help create a club in the Watford area.

It is not good enough at the lack of disability sport available in the area, and I want to change that.
